publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5415 Mr Tom McCabe: The Public Appoinments and Public Bodies etc. (Scotland) Act 2003 (Amendment of Specified Authorities) Order 2007—That the Local Government and Transport Committee recommends that the Public Appoinments and Public Bodies etc. (Scotland) Act 2003 (Amendment of Specified Authorities) Order 2007 be approved. Supported by: George Lyon*

S2M-5415 Mr Tom McCabe: The Public Appoinments and Public Bodies etc. (Scotland) Act 2003 (Amendment of Specified Authorities) Order 2007—That the Local Government and Transport Committee recommends that the Public Appoinments and Public Bodies etc. (Scotland) Act 2003 (Amendment of Specified Authorities) Order 2007 be approved. Supported by: George Lyon
S2M-5415 The Public Appointments and Public Bodies etc. (Scotland) Act 2003 (Amendment of Specified Authorities) Order 2007 (lodged on 15 January 2007) Tavish Scott*
